messages.subject: "The Shinsengumi" clan on Halo 2 (Xbox)
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I am a member of The Shinsengumi clan on the online version of Halo 2 (which is only available for Xbox 2). We have 95 members and room for 5 more --
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

I am a member of "The Shinsengumi" clan on the online version of Halo 2
(which is only available for Xbox 2).

We have 95 members and room for 5 more -- if anyone would like to join,
please let me know. It's a lot of fun.
